active_incidents.title: We are investigating timestamp issues for customers in Brazil

notes.body: We are aware of an issue with Brazilian time zone settings that are affecting notifications, reminders, time stamps and other elements in Slack. Our engineers are coordinating to solve the issue. Thank you for your patience as we investigate!

active_incidents.title: Some Enterprise Grid customers are having trouble accessing Slack

notes.body: Some of our Enterprise Grid customers are having trouble accessing Slack workspaces in our desktop apps. We're currently looking into the cause, and we'll keep you posted as soon as we have more information. For those affected, access to Slack is still available through a web browser. We're sorry for the disruption to your day.

active_incidents.title: Trouble Creating Posts for Enterprise Grid Customers

notes.body: We're looking into reports of issues with creating posts for some Enterprise Grid customers. Thanks for your patience as we look into this.

active_incidents.title: Server errors and some messages failing to send

notes.body: Some customers may be experiencing server errors or messages failing to send in the desktop app. We're very sorry for the trouble and we're working to get things back to normal.
Some people may be having an issue with Slack. We’re currently investigating and will have more information shortly. Thank you for your patience.

active_incidents.title: Issues configuring SAML SSO for some customers

notes.body: Some customers may be experiencing issues configuring SAML SSO. We are investigating and we're very sorry for the disruption.

active_incidents.title: Issues accepting and approving shared channel invites

notes.body: Some customers may be experiencing problems with accepting or approving shared channel invitations. We are investigating and will be back with an update as soon as we have news to share. We're very sorry for the trouble.

active_incidents.title: Some Enterprise Grid customers are having trouble inviting Guests

notes.body: Some of our customers are having trouble inviting Guest accounts. In particular, this appears to be affecting our Enterprise Grid customers. We're currently investigating the cause and we'll keep you updated on new information. We're sorry for the disruption.

active_incidents.title: Trouble with Google Drive thumbnails

notes.body: Google Drive thumbnails for new and recently uploaded files are now visible in Slack. We'll be back with an update on the thumbnails that are still missing. Thanks for your patience.
Google Drive thumbnails aren't displaying in Slack. We're sorry for the trouble, and we'll keep you posted here.

active_incidents.title: Trouble loading Slack for some customers

notes.body: We are working hard to identify the cause of the issue. We will be back with more information in 30 minutes.
Some customers may be having trouble loading Slack or parts of the Slack interface. We're very sorry for the disruption and we have all hands on deck as we investigate. Thank you for bearing with us.

active_incidents.title: Some people unable to access their workspace while using a web browser

notes.body: We're looking into reports of access issues for some people using web browsers. Please hold tight. In the meantime, using a different type of web browser or the desktop app will hopefully get you back into your workspace.

active_incidents.title: Some customers are experiencing delayed or failed actions

notes.body: We’re still investigating the issue with these delayed or failed actions, and we've discovered that this may be affecting searching in Slack as well. We'll confirm as soon as things are working as they should be.

Some of our customers are having trouble completing certain user-related actions, such as when deactivating members. We're currently investigating the cause of these delays, and we'll keep you posted as soon as we have more information. We're sorry for the disruption.

active_incidents.title: Some Enterprise Key Management customers experiencing issues when trying to read or write messages.

notes.body: We've been seeing improvements to the performance of accounts with Enterprise Key Management enabled though we are still investigating the root cause. Thank you for your patience as we get to the bottom of this.

Some customers with Enterprise Key Management enabled may be experiencing issues when trying to read or write messages. We’re looking into it and will provide another update as soon as it’s available.
Some people may be having an issue with Slack. We’re currently investigating and will have more information shortly. Thank you for your patience.

active_incidents.title: Outdated information on Analytics page

notes.body: Information on the Analytics dashboard (https://my.slack.com/stats) is not up to date. We are currently investigating this issue and will be back as soon as we have more news to share. We're sorry for any inconvenience caused in the meantime.

active_incidents.title: Missing custom emoji

notes.body: We're still working towards a solution for this issue. We'll return back here with an update when we have more news to share on a fix.
We've identified the likely cause of this issue and we're now exploring possible fixes. Thank you for your continued patience as we work to get things fixed up.
We're continuing to look into the issue causing custom emoji to not appear for some customers. We're sorry for the trouble and will continue to keep you posted.
Our team is investigating an issue that is causing custom emoji to go missing from some workspaces. We'll keep you updated as soon as we have more information.

active_incidents.title: Some new messages are not appearing on Android

notes.body: Some Android users may notice that new messages are not showing up in channels and DMs immediately. We're actively investigating this issue and will keep you posted as more information becomes available. For now, quitting and reopening the Slack app should allow new messages to load. We're sorry for any disruption this brings to your day.

active_incidents.title: Search results not returning all messages and files

notes.body: We're investigating problems with search indexing. In the meantime, people might notice some messages and files not showing up in search results. We apologize for the inconvenience.

active_incidents.title: We are investigating an issue with notification settings

notes.body: Some users might notice that their notifications settings for mobile are not being respected. We are taking a look and hope to have more news soon.

active_incidents.title: We're looking into an issue with certain API calls

notes.body: We're currently aware of some intermittent latency and timeouts with image attachments, certain API methods (including users.setPhoto, chat.postMessage and chat.update, views.*), and apps which use these features. We are currently investigating and will update when we believe these issues have been resolved. Sorry for the inconvenience.

active_incidents.title: We're looking into an issue with API requests

notes.body: Some users and app developers are currently seeing "Request failed with status code 400" errors when apps submit requests.  We are looking into this and will post when we have more information.

active_incidents.title: Trouble with confirmation emails for invite links

notes.body:
We've determined this issue is only impacting confirmation emails sent after clicking an invite link to join a workspace, while other emails are working as intended. We'll continue to keep you posted as we work towards a fix. 

For now, we recommend sending invitations directly via email, rather than sharing invite links with invitees.

Some customers may be unable to receive emails from Slack. We're currently investigating this issue, and we'll let you know as soon as we have more information. We apologize for the inconvenience in the meantime.
